item.title: conviction
item.description: Trust yourself when the weather turns. Press forward even as cloudy omens loom. Have conviction especially as the arrows eclipse the sky. When Danger approaches, Wrap yourself in Conviction to Ward away the evil. Impish whispers urge quitting. Steel your heart with your cowardiceâ€” Fear: perfect for hardening resolve.
